snippet: Mark Zuckerberg described the social network’s new look for its News Feed as a “personalized newspaper” that allows users to choose the topics they’re most interested in.
abstract: Facebook unveils a new design of its News Feed that presents bigger photos and links, and allows users to see specialized streams on focused topics; changes are intended to retain users in face of competition from specialized social networks and to increase advertising revenue.
lead_paragraph: Mark Zuckerberg described the social network’s new look for its News Feed as a “personalized newspaper” that allows users to choose the topics they’re most interested in.

headline.seo: Facebook Shows Off News Feed Redesign
headline.main: Facebook Shows Off New Home Page Design, Including Bigger Pictures
headline.print_headline: Facebook Shows Off New Home Page Design, Including Bigger Pictures
